articles.author: The Republic, The Republic
articles.title: Shelter operator Southwest Key denounces 'separating families at the border'
articles.description: For several years, Southwest Key Programs has operated shelters that house unaccompanied minors who crossed the U.S.-Mexico border.

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Kaila White, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Separated migrant children may be housed in a quiet building right down the street from you
articles.description: Many neighbors had no idea what the  buildings were, assuming maybe a day-care center or orphanage. Is there one near you?

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Kaila White, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Separated migrant children may be housed in quiet buildings on your block
articles.description: Many neighbors had no idea what the  nondescript buildings were, assuming maybe a day-care center or orphanage. They were surprised to learn they housed minors who entered U.S. without parents or guardians.

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Weldon B. Johnson, Arizona Republic
articles.title: 2018 Arizona monsoon prediction: Possibly wetter than normal?
articles.description: A hot spring could spark an early start to the monsoon. But those early storms could increase fire danger from dry lightning.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Grace Palmieri, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Season for Sharing awards grants to 153 Arizona non-profits
articles.description: Grants are given to local agencies that help at-risk children and families, improve education, aid victims of domestic violence and serve the elderly.

articles.author: Arizona Republic, Arizona Republic
articles.title: Coolest homes: 10 unique modern homes featured on azcentral
articles.description: From minimalist to 'rusty' to hair-raising, here are 10 of the coolest modern homes that have been featured on azcentral.
